941560.name: Music Wars Empire: FM
941560.description:
Release albums, customize your album art, dominate the airwaves, and get rich in the process. With Music Wars Empire: FM, now you can now do more than ever!

  • Dominate the airwaves: Watch as your artists try to climb the charts in a new radio station media system.
  • Rich List: Watch as your artists get richer and richer, climbing to the top of a new chart type!
  • Customizable album art: Create and import your own album art to add the next layer of realism for your artists. With the newly redesigned Album page, it’s never looked prettier!
  • Adjustable Ticket Sales: Modify exactly how many tickets you want to sell for a specific show.

For more details, visit the FM development diary: FM Dev Diary
